mdRecord.dcterms:title: Map of A. Rosenbaum's property at Pine Beach, Va / G.W. Fitchett, Civil Engineer
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Fitchett, G. W. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The Rosenbaum property is located in the block between Maryland Circle and 101st Street, with cross streets Midway and Virginia Ave. The map covers the area between Maryland Ave. and Virginia Ave., with "Exhibition Grounds" bordering Maryland Ave. and the Pine Beach Hotel at the Virginia Ave. intersection. The area is currently occupied by the Norfolk Naval Station. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Robert and Virginia Tunstall Trust Fund, 2009/2010 [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Rosenbaum, A
